org.placeName: Western District of Washington Northern Division

div1.p: STATE AND DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON, COUNTY OF KING.} ss.

being first duly sworn on oath says: That he is the one of the attorneys for Charles M Helmore, the petitioner herein in the above entitled action; that he has heard the foregoing petition read, knows the cntents thereof and believes the same to be true
Subscribed and sworn to before me this 18 day of July 1916
Notary Public for the State of Washington, Residing at Seattle
IN THE UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT FOR THE Western DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON NORTHERN DIVISION
In the matter of the application of Charles M. Helmore for a writ of Habeas Corpus Libellant, Respondent.
ROOM 417, PACIFIC BLOCK, SEATTLE, WASH. Proctor atty for Petitioner
FILED IN THE U.S. District Court, Western Dist. of Washington, NORTHERN DIVISION
FRANK L. CROSBY, Clerk, By Deputy
